mn52:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ānando vesāliyaṁ viharati beluvagāmake.
mn52:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena dasamo gahapati aṭṭhakanāgaro pāṭaliputtaṁ anuppatto hoti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
mn52:2.1_0: Atha kho dasamo gahapati aṭṭhakanāgaro yena kukkuṭārāmo yena aññataro bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
mn52:2.1_1: upasaṅkamitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
mn52:2.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho dasamo gahapati aṭṭhakanāgaro taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:
mn52:2.2_0: “kahaṁ nu kho, bhante, āyasmā ānando etarahi viharati?
mn52:2.3_0: Dassanakāmā hi mayaṁ taṁ āyasmantaṁ ānandan”ti.
mn52:2.4_0: “Eso, gahapati, āyasmā ānando vesāliyaṁ viharati beluvagāmake”ti.
mn52:3.1_0: Atha kho dasamo gahapati aṭṭhakanāgaro pāṭaliputte taṁ karaṇīyaṁ tīretvā yena vesālī yena beluvagāmako yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
mn52:3.1_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
mn52:3.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho dasamo gahapati aṭṭhakanāgaro āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
mn52:3.2_2: tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ekadhammo akkhāto yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa
mn52:3.2_3: ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttañceva cittaṁ vimuccati,
mn52:3.3_1: tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ekadhammo akkhāto,
mn52:3.3_2: yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttañceva cittaṁ vimuccati,
mn52:3.4_2: tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ekadhammo akkhāto,
mn52:3.4_3: yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttañceva cittaṁ vimuccati,
mn52:4.1_1: bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
mn52:4.4_0: Yaṁ kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ tadaniccaṁ nirodhadhamman’ti pajānāti.
mn52:4.5_0: So tattha ṭhito āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pāpuṇāti.
mn52:4.6_1: teneva dhammarāgena tāya dhammanandiyā pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
mn52:4.7_1: tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ekadhammo akkhāto,
mn52:4.7_2: yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttañceva cittaṁ vimuccati,
mn52:6.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, gahapati, bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
mn52:7.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, gahapati, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
mn52:8.1_1: bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,
mn52:8.1_5: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
mn52:8.4_0: Yaṁ kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ tadaniccaṁ nirodhadhamman’ti pajānāti.
mn52:9.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, gahapati, bhikkhu karuṇāsahagatena cetasā …pe…
mn52:11.1_0: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,
mn52:11.1_4: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
mn52:11.4_0: Yaṁ kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ tadaniccaṁ nirodhadhamman’ti pajānāti.
mn52:12.1_1: bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto
mn52:12.4_0: Yaṁ kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ tadaniccaṁ nirodhadhamman’ti pajānāti.
mn52:13.1_1: bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
mn52:13.4_0: Yaṁ kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ tadaniccaṁ nirodhadhamman’ti pajānāti.
mn52:14.1_1: bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
mn52:14.4_0: Yaṁ kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ tadaniccaṁ nirodhadhamman’ti pajānāti.
mn52:14.5_0: So tattha ṭhito āsavānaṁ khayaṁ pāpuṇāti.
mn52:14.6_1: teneva dhammarāgena tāya dhammanandiyā pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
mn52:14.7_1: tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ekadhammo akkhāto yattha bhikkhuno appamattassa
mn52:14.7_2: ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avimuttañceva cittaṁ vimuccati,
mn52:15.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, dasamo gahapati aṭṭhakanāgaro āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
mn52:15.2_2: puriso ekaṁva nidhimukhaṁ gavesanto sakideva ekādasa nidhimukhāni adhigaccheyya;
mn52:15.3_1: ekaṁ amatadvāraṁ gavesanto sakideva ekādasa amatadvārāni alatthaṁ bhāvanāya.
mn52:15.4_2: so tasmiṁ agāre āditte ekamekenapi dvārena sakkuṇeyya attānaṁ sotthiṁ kātuṁ;
mn52:15.5_1: imesaṁ ekādasannaṁ amatadvārānaṁ ekamekenapi amatadvārena sakkuṇissāmi attānaṁ sotthiṁ kātuṁ.
mn52:15.6_2: kimaṅgaṁ panāhaṁ āyasmato ānandassa pūjaṁ na karissāmī”ti.
mn52:16.1_0: Atha kho dasamo gahapati aṭṭhakanāgaro pāṭaliputtakañca vesālikañca bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātetvā paṇītena
